column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Delicious hand-made pizza! Deep dish pizza shipped from Chicago to Florida. First time ordering pizza to be shipped from another state
column2: but it was worth it. I was so worried about the packaging and quality. The items came well packed in a foam cooler with dry ice. The package arrived around 3pm via UPS and I got home about 4 hours later and the items were still frozen. I am very happy with the quality and taste. I really like the taste of the vine ripped tomatoes
column5: and yummy crust. The pizza came with clear cooking instructions and it cooked perfectly. Also
column6: their customer service line was very friendly and professional. They are a little bit expensive
column7: but worth it. I will definitely order again.
